help: Command list and short description of each command.
nice: Retrieves status of cryptocurrency miner from Nicehash.
np: Displays information about the currently playing song.
queue: Adds a song to current song playlist using a YouTube video URL.
next: (auth) Skips to next song in current song playlist.
sysinfo: Displays information about Cardinal's system specs and Node.js version.
userinfo: Prints out JSON representation of calling user.
